metadata.name: Resonance
metadata.description:
Resonance is my way of reflecting the constant vibration of movement and the interaction of different forms and languages ​​coexisting in the same space.

Last piece of my series "Inner Worlds" which started in 2020 as a media exploration series and ends with this animation.

This collection contains the work from the end of 2020 to the end of 2021, it seeks to be a bridge between my internal worlds and external reality, telling my experiences from an aesthetic language that was not planned and evolved in different techniques finding its own character and which It makes me very happy to be ready to immortalize on the Blockchain.

It includes techniques as pencil drawing, serigraphy, linoleum, digital illustration  and 3D modeling and animation.  
They are 1/1 pieces due to the sense of connection that I seek to establish with the people who may be interested in collecting. Some parts include unlockable content (Primary sale only)
